## Government Tender Announcement
#### Digital Polymerase Chain Reaction Instrument

**Reference:** WS3985228504-Doc4252399963
**Amendment:** 1
**Publication Date:** October 10, 2023
**Tender Closing Date and Time:** November 3, 2023, 2:00 pm Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)
**Expected Contract Start and End Dates:** June 16, 2023, and June 16, 2024, respectively

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) has a requirement for the supply of one Digital Polymerase Chain Reaction (PCR) Instrument to be delivered to Ottawa, Ontario, on or before January 29, 2024. Bidders are expected to meet the mandatory requirements detailed in the Request for Proposal. The contract period includes a one-year term, with the option to extend for up to three additional one-year periods under the same terms and conditions.

This requirement is being solicited as a conditional set-aside under the Federal Government Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB).
